nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence.Level

  • class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a level of the game. Each Level consists of a level number, a clock value, and a layout of tiles. Each of these classes contains information read in from a JSON file in the levels folder.
     

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int clock
      Number of seconds to play the level
      private java.lang.String[] helpText
      The help information to be displayed
      private java.lang.String[] layout
      The arrangement of tiles
      private int levelNumber
      The level number shown in the GUI
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> secondaryActorNames
      The Map object here contains each numeric string code in the Level layout can have 1 or more secondary actors, and each of those actors take a String as a name in its constructor.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.List<Direction>>> secondaryActorPaths
      The Map object here contains each numeric string code in the Level layout can have 1 or more secondary actors, and each of those actors takes a list of Directions in its constructor.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Position>> secondaryActorPositions

      • secondaryActorPaths

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.List<Direction>>> secondaryActorPaths
        The Map object here contains each numeric string code in the Level layout can have 1 or more secondary actors, and each of those actors takes a list of Directions in its constructor.

      • secondaryActorNames

        private final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> secondaryActorNames
        The Map object here contains each numeric string code in the Level layout can have 1 or more secondary actors, and each of those actors take a String as a name in its constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        protected Level(int levelNumber,
                java.lang.String[] levelLayout,
                int clock,
                java.lang.String[] helpText)
        Constructor for a Level without secondary actors
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - the level number displayed on the GUI
        levelLayout - the arrangement of Tiles represented as a 2D array of Strings
        clock - the number of seconds allowed to play the level
        helpText - the instructions given by HelpTiles

      • Level

        protected Level(int levelNumber,
                java.lang.String[] levelLayout,
                int clock,
                java.lang.String[] helpText,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.util.List<Direction>>> secondaryActorPaths,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> secondaryActorNames,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Position>> secondaryActorPositions)
        Constructor for a Level including secondary actors
        Parameters:
        levelNumber - the Level number
        levelLayout - The Maze board as a String array
        clock - the clock/time value
        helpText - the Level's help text
        secondaryActorPaths - the secondary actors paths
        secondaryActorNames - the secondary actors names
        secondaryActorPositions - the secondary actors positions
